sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ifeyinwa Okonkwo  e ji "Madam Benz" mara ekwuola ka o si malite irụ ọrụ ụgbọala.
O kwuru na ọ rụọla ọrụ a ruo afọ iri abụọ.
Blind Mechanic: Ekpuru m isi mana onweghị onye ka m arụ ọrụ inginia
Ọgba mbọ: Ukamaka Okoye bụ nwaanyị na-arụpụta ụzụ igwe
'Ọsọ ahịa enyela m ego mana lee ihe mere m gaghị ekwe ka nwa m mee ya'
Okonkwo kwuru na iru ụgbọala aghịaghị ahụ nke bụ na ụmụnwaanyị nwereike iji ya mere aka ọrụ.
O kwuru na ọ ga-achọ ka ụmụ ya banye ọrụ a.
Kirie ihe o kwuru n'uju ebe a.
